title: US Fed Meeting 2025 Highlights | US Fed Rate Cut Highlights | US Fed FOMC Meeting Highlights - Investing Abroad News | The Financial Express
snippet: US Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell said on 10 December 2025 that the central bank is not considering interest rate hikes in the near term, given its closer-to-neutral policy stance.

title: December Fed Meeting: Updates and Commentary | Kiplinger
snippet: And we'll be there all the way through to the other side of Fed Chair Jerome Powell's press conference. ... Stocks trended lower throughout Monday's session as caution set in ahead of the December Fed meeting.

title: AHRC and German Research Foundation renew research partnership – UKRI
snippet: Subsequent annual rounds will follow the same monthly pattern. Top image: From left to right: AHRC Executive Chair Professor Christopher Smith and Dr Claudia Althaus, Deputy Head of the Humanities Department at the DFG.

title: Germany, DFG: von Kaven Award 2025 Goes to Mathematician Andrii Mironchenko
snippet: Dr. habil. Andrii Mironchenko, Chair of Applied Mathematics at The University of Bayreuth, was awarded von Kaven Award, conferred by the Deutsche Forschungsgemeinschaft (DFG, German Research Foundation) in recognition of his outstanding research in mathematical systems theory.

title: 2025 Democratic National Committee chairmanship election - Wikipedia
snippet: November 6, 2024 – Reuters reports that Jaime Harrison will not seek re-election as chair of the Democratic National Committee in 2025 following the party's defeat in the 2024 United States presidential election.
